data.Name: NhÃ¢n TrÃ­ 2 - BÃºn BÃ² Huáº¿
data.Address: 758 Tráº§n HÆ°ng Äáº¡o A, P. 7, Quáº­n 5, TP. HCM

TopReViews.Title: Splurge a bit.
TopReViews.Comment:
Sometimes it's worth it to splurge it a little bit. 

This place's decoration and seating area is very basic. There's outside with couple tables where you can watch the traffic. The inside is a bit better with air cool fans blowing.

I went here on an evening around 6. The sun was already setting down. We sat outside and it was cool and breezy, but i would recommend sitting inside because there's a lot of flies and fleas flying around.

I got bun canh cua. Which are those short white noodles with crab meats. The bowl was pretty decent size. It came with crabs, 3 shrimps, a piece of fish cake, and slices of pork. I believe there's actually more meats than noodles in this bowl.

The cost of it is 65k. Expensive? Yes it is. Is it worth it? Definitely. Consider that a single crab can sometime cost 100k, this bowl of noodles definitely give you more crab meats than 1 crab. So yes, the quality is worth the price.

You really get what you paid for here.
